name: 2D Shooter Tutorial (bankerha)
description:
List of Modifications:

  • Made the levels bigger (more space for the player to move around)
  • I changed all the font to capital letters; I think it looks nicer and fits the theme of the game
  • Added a third level
    • Each level has progressively harder difficulty, level 3 being the hardest
    • Each level has a unique enemy layout and a different number of enemies needed to be killed to win
  •  Added text to the instructions page
  • Added an endless level, accessible via the level page, that features music I wrote in MuseScore
